Returns: the tint applied to the background drawable
getSupportBackgroundTintList().Description: Return the tint applied to the background drawable, if specified.

Returns: the blending mode used to apply the tint to the background drawable
getSupportBackgroundTintMode().Description: Return the blending mode used to apply the tint to the background drawable, if specified.

ClassDesc: Interface which allows a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#View_E@ to receive background tinting calls from @B_android#support#v4#view#ViewCompat_E@ when running on API v20 devices or lower.
